summary:
Stephen: I've always had a hard time choosing presents for Tony. What do you get a man who already has everything?
Stephen: And...
body:
Stephen: I've always had a hard time choosing presents for Tony. What do you get a man who already has everything?
Stephen: And by everything, I mean me.

tags: my friends all hate me because of this

loki was going to be a part of this
summary: Tony Stark's death
body:
Tony Stark’s death

So the Endgame is coming and as we all know, Tony’s probably going to die.

But here’s the thing, knowing Marvel, they’ll probably make an epic death. Like, he died in battle or something. But I kinda, don’t want that? Like, it would be heroic and all, but I kind of hope they won’t do that. I kind of hope his death won’t be because of battle wounds, no I want his death to be the opposite.

I want Cap to die a heroic death, but Tony? Oh no, Tony survives. Tony grabs the gauntlet and just, puts it on. I want everyone to just, return. Everyone. Then, I want Tony to run into Stephen and Peter and hug them both, tightly. I want Stephen to cry and I want Peter to hug him back. I want Stephen to murmer ‘sorry’ over and over and over again.

After that I want Tony to look Stephen in the eye and say 'Tell Pepper I love her’. I want Tony to free himself from the hug and walk away. I want him to stop after a meter or two and I want him to turn around, showing everyone he’s crying. I want him to raise his hand and snap his fingers, but instead of people dying, everyone forgets. He makes everyone forget Anthony Edward Stark and remember Ironman. I want Stephen to shield himself while crying. I want that to work. I want Peter to look at Tony and say 'Who is that?’ I want Tony to cry and say 'I love you. And Stephen, don’t feel guilty, part of the journey is the end.’ I want him to smile through his tears. I want him disintegrate. I want him to slowly turn to dust while everyone is watching, gauntlet included. I want Stephen to whisper 'I’m sorry’. And then the movie ends.

I want the credits to be white on a pitch black background. Without music, it’s silent. And after all of that, I want the post-credits scene to be Tony, all alone in the soulrealm, to put his helmet on the ground, and turn it off. And then it ends.

I want Anthony Edward Stark’s story to end tragically. I don’t want it to be a death in battle, because I don’t think that’ll be it for him. This character is based differently, and I think it would be quite poetic to make his death the ultimate sacrifice. Because Tony is an amazing person, but the one thing he’s really good at, is sacrificing himself for others.

I want Tony Stark to sacrifice himself for a world which never loved him.

blog.name: hardladyheart
blog.title: Writing the impossible
blog.description: Writer, Reader, and Gamer that speaks the language of Sarcasm. Mostly just a girl that enjoys writing fanfiction.

summary: Philodox (Tony)
title: Philodox (Tony)
body:
Philodox: Person in love with his own opinions; loves to hear himself talk

“Tony, if you don’t stop I will put everyone out of there misery and shoot you,” Clint said with hitting his head on the table.

“Stop what? Stop being so sexy? Stop being the best hero? Stop wooing women?” Tony couldn’t help but smile and look at you at the mention of ‘wooing.’

You laughed at the thought of him even trying. There was no way you’d let Tony Stark bed you. Well, at least that was what you wanted him to think. But you also wouldn’t mind if any of the men on the team tried to sleep with you.

“Answer my question, Cupcake, or are you too busy fantasizing about me?” Tony leaned closer to you.

“Actually, I was fantasizing about Barton.” Clint looked up at you with 'what the hell’ written all over his face while you just smiled.

Tony could only grumble at your answer before speaking, “you just haven’t been around me long enough. The more you’re around me, the more you’ll want me.”

Yep, definitely full of himself. “Actually, I’m around you enough to not want you. Being around you more would just make me want to shoot myself in the face.”

“And ruin that gorgeous face of yours? I think not,” Tony stated with a grin and trying to touch your cheek.

You pulled away before he got the chance and stood up. Walking closer to the door, but keeping your eyes on Tony, you kissed Barton on the cheek before heading out.

Tony followed you about in the Avengers tower with a grin, watching your backside. “Come on, you know you want me.”

You turned to him, crossing your arms over your chest. “Want you for what?”

Tony stepped closer to you, grabbing your waist. “Oh, you know… everything.”

You rolled your eyes and moved his hands, stepping back from the arrogant sod. “I don’t think so. It may come to a surprise, Stark, but not every woman wants you.”

“Of course, they do, it just takes some a little more of a nudge than the others. Like you, for instance, I can see the way you look at me and I know you dream about me constantly. I just need to give you a nudge in the right direction.” With the last sentence, he smacked your bottom.

With a growl, you grabbed his wrist, bending his arm behind him painfully. “You love to hear yourself talk, don’t you?”

Tony winced and said, “yes, it’s one of many of my better qualities. I didn’t realize you enjoyed being so rough, I’ll have to remember that for later.”

You yanked on his arm more, bringing him to his knees, his back towards you. “Anthony, listen, I know this is hard to understand, but I’m not THAT interested. All you’re doing is ticking me off which gets you no chance with me at all, got it?”

“Sorry, what were you saying? All I got out of that was that you’re interested.” With an irritated growl, you let him go and stormed off.
body_abstract:
Philodox: Person in love with his own opinions; loves to hear himself talk

“Tony, if you don’t stop I will put everyone out of there misery and shoot you,” Clint said with hitting his head on the table.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: My Name Is Peter
title: My Name Is Peter
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Jyhvrs

by readingbylamplight

He was falling.

The world moved by in a blur and Daniel continued to cling to his shirt; dragging them both down into oblivion, into nothingness, to their deaths.

No, not death. Androids couldn’t die because they weren’t alive. When they hit the ground, they would simply shut down.

And then he woke up.

“Your name is Peter.”

My name is Peter.

(In which Tony is Hank and Peter is Connor)

  • Categories: Gen

  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark

No, not death. Androids couldn’t die because they weren’t alive. When they hit the ground, they would simply shut down.

And then he woke up.

“Your name is Peter.”

My name is Peter.

(In which Tony is Hank and Peter is Connor)

tags: I might write a fic where Tony visits LA and somehow gets adopted by Lucifer and yeah he's gonna still be in his late 40's Luci don't care
summary: With how self-loving and narcissistic yet empathetically growing Lucifer Morningstar is...he would see himself a LOT in Tony...
body:
With how self-loving and narcissistic yet empathetically growing Lucifer Morningstar is…he would see himself a LOT in Tony Stark. Ergo…Lucifer Morningstar would be one of THE BIGGEST Team Ironman fans ever. 

They got similar characteristics, sense of style, love of classic cars, daddy issues, Pepper and Maze are equals(fight me if you think otherwise),Peter and Ella are adorable…

Lucifer would assign himself as Tony’s personal guardian angel

by SyoshoHiataki

Tony Stark hated stupid but genius villains. Now, he and the infamous Winter Soldier were stuck in an alternate world with different Heroes running around. Needless to say, he and Bucky were going to prove that you don’t need a Quirk to be a Hero. After all, he was one.

summary: Personal Effects
title: Personal Effects
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Oeui0J

by Bravehardt, Foxglove_Fiction

Without the unnecessary distractions of rampant and uncontrollable hormonal urges onset by stray alien influences, Tony and Stephen take their time to finally explore the more intimate side of their proposed relationship. Unfortunately not everything that glimmers is gold and the two of them soon realize that there is so much more below just surface-level interaction that drives a good relationship. Each of them have their own crosses to bear and old habits die hard.

Turns out dating a hero really is a challenge.

blog.name: buckyusuallytopstony
blog.title: Something Clever
blog.description:
Shipping Tony Stark with happiness.

WinterIron/Stuckony/Stony slut... mainly WinterIron tho.

summary: Bucky is always cold, whenever he thinks of all the things the soldier did his blood turns to ice and there’s a chill that won’t...
body:
Bucky is always cold, whenever he thinks of all the things the soldier did his blood turns to ice and there’s a chill that won’t leave for hours, so Tony starts buying him sweaters. But not pretty ones, oh no. He gets Bucky some ridiculous knit ones that has stuff like “I ❤️ Iron Man” and another one that has two Iron Man helmets strategically placed so that they’re on his pecs.

Bucky is not ashamed to admit that the sweaters chase the cold away.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: comicsohwhyohwhy
blog.title: Comics, oh why, oh why
blog.description: Comics, oh why, oh why Comics (you probably guessed that, you smart person!). Loads of Iron Man, Fantastic Four, Avengers, mostly Marvel, but also DC, whatever the hell tickles my fancy, also including the respective movie verses. Stuff about games like Dragon Age or Mass Effect or books and TV shows that I love, such as The Raven Cycle or Lucifer. Absurd things that I happen to find funny. Stuff that isn't safe for work is tagged accordingly, for your blacklisting purposes. My ask is open, talk to me, post headcanons, questions, prompts, don't be scared, I usually don't bite!

summary:
TONY STARK: IRON MAN #13 
 GAIL SIMONE (W) • PAOLO VILLANELLI (A) Cover by ALEXANDER LOZANO MARVELS 25TH TRIBUTE VARIANT COVER...
caption:
TONY STARK: IRON MAN #13

  • GAIL SIMONE (W) • PAOLO VILLANELLI (A)
  • Cover by ALEXANDER LOZANO
  • MARVELS 25TH TRIBUTE VARIANT COVER BY CLAYTON CRAIN
  • WAR OF THE REALMS TIE-IN!  HOW TO FIGHT YOUR DRAGON!
  • The concluding chapter to this special WAR OF THE REALMS story, as Iron Man finds himself struggling against the ancient mystical forces he has the LEAST power to resist. Tony fights an ancient winged calamity AND his own technology with the lives of everyone at STARK UNLIMITED hanging in the balance!

Tony fights an ancient winged calamity AND his own technology with the lives of everyone at STARK UNLIMITED hanging in the balance!
trail.content:
TONY STARK: IRON MAN #13

  • GAIL SIMONE (W) • PAOLO VILLANELLI (A)
  • Cover by ALEXANDER LOZANO
  • MARVELS 25TH TRIBUTE VARIANT COVER BY CLAYTON CRAIN
  • WAR OF THE REALMS TIE-IN!  HOW TO FIGHT YOUR DRAGON!
  • The concluding chapter to this special WAR OF THE REALMS story, as Iron Man finds himself struggling against the ancient mystical forces he has the LEAST power to resist. Tony fights an ancient winged calamity AND his own technology with the lives of everyone at STARK UNLIMITED hanging in the balance!

blog.name: love-loki-laufeyson
blog.title: We're up all night to get Loki

summary: “Hey, man. Don’t get too attached to things. Learn to let go.”
title: “Hey, man. Don’t get too attached to things. Learn to let go.”
body:
No, but… 

…can we just sit down for a while and talk about how Tony, despite being  a billionaire, isn’t materialistic, like, at all?

He constantly keeps destroying half of his lab while experimenting with the suits.

He crashes into his expensive car while flight test.

He pays for strawberries with his (probably worth millions) watch. 

He slices his lab in a half while making a new element.

His house, his HOME is literally bombed, everything destroyed… yet he only cares about Pepper being safe. 

He only recovers Dum-e. The bot he practically “raised” and has an attachment to. 

He spends ages on building all the suits, yet he destroys them all in the end. For the person he has an attachment to.

Tony only cares about people, not things. 

Yes he is a billionaire and can easily buy everything new but still there are irreplaceable stuff, very expensive stuff, stuff that is not available anymore, etc. 

This post has no conclusion, it’s just… what I recently had in mind. And a bit of Tony appreciation.
